mapper.select: SELECT rn.id AS id, rn.code AS code, rn.name AS name, rnt.id AS noticeTypeId, rnt.name AS noticeTypeName, rn.status AS status, rn.instancy_level_id AS instancyLevelId, rn.instancy_level_name AS instancyLevelName, rn.publish_id AS publishId, rn.publish_name AS publishName, rn.publish_time AS publishTime, rn.send_total AS sendTotal, rn.content AS content, rn.publish_department AS publishDepartment, ro.organiza_name as publishDepartmentName FROM r_notice rn LEFT JOIN r_notice_type rnt ON rn.notice_type_id=rnt.id LEFT JOIN r_organiza ro ON rn.publish_department = ro.organiza_id WHERE rn.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO r_notice ( id, code, name, content, notice_type_id, notice_type_name, status, instancy_level_id, instancy_level_name, publish_id, publish_name, send_total, publish_department, crt_id, crt_name, crt_time, modf_id, modf_name, modf_time, publish_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{notice.name}, #{notice.content}, #{notice.noticeTypeId}, #{notice.noticeTypeName}, #{notice.status}, #{notice.instancyLevelId}, #{notice.instancyLevelName}, #{notice.publishId}, #{notice.publishName}, #{notice.sendTotal}, #{publishDepartment}, #{notice.crtId}, #{notice.crtName}, #{notice.crtTime}, #{notice.modfId}, #{notice.modfName}, #{notice.modfTime}, #{notice.publishTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE r_notice SET name=#{notice.name}, content=#{notice.content}, notice_type_id=#{notice.noticeTypeId}, notice_type_name=#{notice.noticeTypeName}, status=#{notice.status}, send_total=#{notice.sendTotal}, instancy_level_id=#{notice.instancyLevelId}, instancy_level_name=#{notice.instancyLevelName}, modf_time=#{notice.modfTime}, publish_time=#{notice.publishTime} WHERE id=#{notice.id}
UPDATE r_notice SET status = #{status}, publish_time=#{publishTime}, modf_time=#{modfTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT cmn_cd AS cmnCd, cmn_cd_val AS cmnCdVal, cmn_cd_val_nm AS cmnCdNm, cmn_cd_val_desc AS cmnDesc FROM r_cmn_cd_val WHERE status = '1' AND cmn_cd = '1002'
SELECT cmn_cd AS cmnCd, cmn_cd_val AS cmnCdVal, cmn_cd_val_nm AS cmnCdNm, cmn_cd_val_desc AS cmnDesc FROM r_cmn_cd_val WHERE status = '1' AND cmn_cd = '1003'
SELECT count(1) FROM t_u_admin WHERE valid_sts_cd = 1
SELECT count(1) FROM r_notice_read rnr LEFT JOIN r_notice rn ON rnr.notice_id = rn.id WHERE rnr.notice_id = #{id}

SELECT rn.id as id, rnr.crt_id AS userId, tua.user_name as userName, rnr.read_time as readTime, rnr.status as remark, tua.user_department_id as departmentId, ro.organiza_name as department FROM r_notice_read rnr LEFT JOIN r_notice rn ON rnr.notice_id = rn.id LEFT JOIN t_u_admin tua ON rnr.crt_id = tua.id LEFT JOIN r_organiza ro ON rn.publish_department = ro.organiza_id WHERE rnr.notice_id = #{id} ORDER BY rnr.read_time
LIMIT ${start},${limit}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_u_admin tua WHERE tua.valid_sts_cd = 1 AND tua.id not in (SELECT crt_id FROM r_notice_read where notice_id=#{id})

SELECT tua.id as id, tua.user_name as userName, ro.organiza_name as department, '' as readTome, 0 as remark FROM t_u_admin tua LEFT JOIN r_organiza ro ON tua.user_department_id = ro.organiza_id WHERE tua.valid_sts_cd = 1 AND tua.id not in (SELECT crt_id FROM r_notice_read where notice_id=#{id})
LIMIT ${start},${limit}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_u_admin WHERE valid_sts_cd = 1

SELECT tua.id as userId, tua.user_name AS userName, tua.user_department_id AS departmentId, ro.organiza_name AS department, '' as readTime, 0 as remark FROM t_u_admin tua LEFT JOIN r_organiza ro ON ro.organiza_id = tua.user_department_id WHERE tua.valid_sts_cd = 1
LIMIT ${start},${limit}

SELECT r.organiza_id as id, r.organiza_name as name, (CASE r.parent_organiza_id WHEN '' THEN 0 ELSE r.parent_organiza_id END) as parentId, (CASE WHEN r.organiza_id IN ( SELECT tua.user_department_id as parentId FROM r_notice_permission rnp LEFT JOIN t_u_admin tua ON rnp.crt_id = tua.id WHERE rnp.notice_id = #{noticeId} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as hasState FROM r_organiza r WHERE r.parent_organiza_id = '' OR r.organiza_id in(select user_department_id from t_u_admin where valid_sts_cd = 1) UNION SELECT a.id AS id, a.user_name AS name, a.user_department_id AS parentId, (CASE WHEN a.id IN ( SELECT rnp.crt_id as id FROM r_notice_permission rnp LEFT JOIN t_u_admin tua ON rnp.crt_id = tua.id WHERE rnp.notice_id = #{noticeId}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as hasState FROM t_u_admin a WHERE a.valid_sts_cd = 1

SELECT rn.id AS id, rn.code AS code, rn.name AS name, rn.status AS status, rn.publish_id AS publishId, rn.publish_name AS publishName, rn.publish_time AS publishTime, rn.content AS content FROM r_notice rn WHERE rn.id=#{id}
